ResearchProjectDef.label: 3HST railguns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows production of 3HST-designed railguns with relatively low projectile velocity and heavy projectile weight, that trade barrel life and damage for penetration.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->reverse engineered a buried cache of railguns [cache_story]
cache_story->near a cargo ship crash site
subject_story->assembled salvaged railgun parts into a weapon to fight [armored_enemies]

ResearchProjectDef.label: 3HST EMA rails
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows production of advanced electromagnetic accelerators, an essential component if you want to keep your railguns firing.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->analyzed a sample of accelerator rail at sub-molecular level, unraveled the trade secret that [faction] has been keeping
subject_story->secretly kept note of accelerator rail's unique alloy structure while working in [site]
subject_story->[steal_verb] [site] and obtained infomation about the specialized manufacturing process of accelerator rails

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced LGIS missile
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft experimental, advanced yet more costy LGIS missiles.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->wondered what else can be attached to a standard LGIS [thruster]
subject_story->superglued a boomrat onto a LGIS missile, invalidating its warranty in the process
subject_story->wanted extra variety of warheads to be delivered via LGIS platform

ResearchProjectDef.label: 3HST Scatterailguns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows production of scatterailguns, high caliber low power railguns designed to fire buckshot and grenades.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->restored [ANYPAWN_possessive] grandfather's beloved war trophy, a pump action scatterailgun
subject_story->hired to renovate civil war era IFVs and their twin barrel heavy scatterailgun
subject_story->revived the design of scatterailguns, which was no longer manufactured by 3HST since the end of the war
